title: How do new YouTubers, Instagrams, and TikToks get views? - Quora

response.answer_text: The short answer is by uploading content that people want to watch. YouTube videos get views from search and subscribers. YouTube is second only to it's parent company Google for search volume. SEO is a big key to success on YouTube. Instagram and TikTok basically work like this. Imagine you had a cool picture or video and I liked it. I showed it to my friends and they like it. They show it to their friends and it keeps going. If only a small percentage of the people that see your photo like it, it will be shown to a lot less people than if 100% of the impressions got you a like.

Nowadays there are many people gotten famous in this line that's why you are gonna get fewer views on your videos its because you are not more famous than them. So, therefore if you want views on your Youtube, Instagram & Tiktoks videos then go to BuySocialBuzz. I am telling you this because I have used their services and I got the best services from them. The response to my videos was great. Also, their payment method is easy. You can trust them for your work.
